{"id":365789016,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 1 month","timestamp":1594595774,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/365789016/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int sum =0;\n    int visited[51][51];\n    void dfs(vector<vector<int>>& grid,int r ,int c,int n,int m){\n        if(visited[r][c] || r<0 || r>=n || c<0 || c>=m || grid[r][c]==0)\n            return ;\n        sum++;\n        visited[r][c]=1;\n        dfs(grid,r+1,c,n,m);\n        dfs(grid,r-1,c,n,m);\n        dfs(grid,r,c+1,n,m);\n        dfs(grid,r,c-1,n,m);\n    }\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int ans =0;\n        int n = grid.size();\n        if( n== 0)\n            return ans;\n        int m =grid[0].size();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){\n                visited[i][j]=0;\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){\n                if(!visited[i][j] && grid[i][j]==1){\n                    sum =0;\n                    dfs(grid,i,j,n,m);\n                    ans =max(ans,sum);\n                    \n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
